#summary Description of the /game/raise/ page.
#labels Phase-Design

=== Introduction ===
The raise page is used to raise a certain amount in the game you're in.

=== Method ===
HTTP POST 

=== Request ===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<amount>5</amount>
}}}

=== Response ===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ok/>
}}}
